entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
